website_summaries.verdict: Double stitching of the Oxford cloth fabric adds to the durability of this cover for push mowers.
pros: Double waterproof coating provides protection for indoor or outdoor storage
Protects against UV rays, wind, snow, rain, dust, birds and other elements
cons: Not as thick and heavy-duty as expected
It may blow away from your lawn mower easily

customer_reviews.title: Yes! They really do make lawnmower covers and this one is perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't even know anyone made lawnmower covers. . .But I have a lawn and a lawnmower and no shed. I felt a couple of weeks ago like a blessed idiot for leaving the mower out all winter and discovering that, with a little TLC, it still worked. . .But my heart bled for it, poor neglected soul, and after fine-tuning it a little more I decided to look for something to protect it. The Himal cover is exactly as described--a perfect fit, covering everything. It will assure that my mower finally gets the protection it deserves.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Simmons

customer_reviews.title: 60+ MPH WINDS
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for just under a week but it's worth it. I originally had my mower under tarps but this is way better! I personally rolled my mower's wheels over the ends to keep it down, as well it does have a pull string to keep it all together.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit, easy to take on and off.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this along with myand it fit perfectly the mower perfectly! It rained for an entire week after I received both, but this cover kept my new mower nice and dry. It's really easy to take on and off and the drawstring ensures a perfect fit. It's very windy in my region and the cover always stays put.
customer_reviews.author: Shrimp! Heaven! Now!

customer_reviews.title: Needed a cover since I have the mower outside, ...
customer_reviews.text: Needed a cover since I have the mower outside, It fit my Craftsman mower perfectly. With the draw string you can tighten it up if needed.
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: Good mower cover, 2nd time purchasing
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, covers the entire mower securely and safely. Has a draw string to keep it on when it gets windy. This is a replacement for one I bought in 2017, the original had got the point where it was simply disintegrating after being in the Arizona sun every day for 3 years. I think this is about as good as can be expected for any kind of synthetic material cover with that kind of UV cover. The mower still looks brand new so the cover did it's job. This new one looks like it has a little better reflective material coating on the inside so we'll see if it lasts any longer than the last one.
customer_reviews.author: Jason C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a MTD Chipper Shredder
customer_reviews.text: Made for a mower but PERFECT for my MTD Chipper Shredder. I’ve been looking for a cover for my chipper shredder but nobody seems to make one. So I kinda guessed based on the measurements and it’s perfect. It looks well made so I expect it will hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Rob M.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: This happened after the first wind storm this cover experienced. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Lasted Exactly 1 Year
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cover about 14 months ago. I live in sunny SoCal (LA) and keep my mower on my patio in direct sun. I don't have a shed or a roof over my patio. That's what I bought this cover. The cover lasted about 1 year. It is now a bleached, torn up, shredded mess. I wouldn't exactly say this thing is immune to UV light as the description states. The sun will bleach it and kill it. I suggest you keep looking if you don't have a roof over your lawnmower.
customer_reviews.author: Trouser Slacksman

customer_reviews.title: Love this handy item when it wasn't ripped
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect whether I leave handle up or down for storage. Not a drop of water gets thru, great price. Update 8/17. Purchased June 4th. Item ripped, contacted support August 11th. They requested order number and pics which I did. Supposedly they have a lifetime free warranty. Have not heard a thing. Saying you have a free warranty and actually standing by it are two different things
customer_reviews.author: Cat Lady

customer_reviews.title: Great Cover
customer_reviews.text: We just had a good rain and the mower is good. This keeps off rain and dirt and fits my mower well. It has a draw string along the bottom which works well.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gilfillan

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: It was thinner than what I was expecting, but time will tell on its durability. It fits perfectly fine on my mower... I have a 22" self-propel mower
customer_reviews.author: Adam S

customer_reviews.title: Good option for outdoor mower storage
customer_reviews.text: This is south Texas so it really only needs to keep the rain off it. Fits my 10 year old 22" Toro self propelled mower with the rear bag installed. Decent protection against the elements though it is a little thin. Comes with a handy bag to put the cover in when not is use. It's going to get dirty but I've been switching to battery power and until I get my Ego battery mower that I can store in the garage without the gasoline smell then it will do its job fine.
customer_reviews.author: g-star

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very satisfied with this mower cover. It covered the whole mower with ease. Durable material that protects from the rain. Nice little bag too.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Blumenthal

customer_reviews.title: Lawnmower cover
customer_reviews.text: My cover to my lawnmower just arrived and it’s perfect to the size so that’s why I gave it a 5 star but it’s a pretty thin material
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Super Thin
customer_reviews.text: I don't have a shed in the yard so needed this to cover my mower from the elements. This is probably best for just keeping dust off your mower when it's indoors. It didn't take long for the elements to take their toll on this and tear holes in it. It's a pretty thin material.
customer_reviews.author: Matt E

customer_reviews.title: So far so good and holding up well after 7 months!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second comment after 7 months of use. So far, it is still good. I live in Southern California and this cover is exposed to intense UV. Normally, ordinary cotton based material or even the toughest plastic tarp won't last being exposed 24 hrs. a day for many months. The color faded somewhat at the exposed surface but there's no sign of any chafing or cracks and the cover is still pliable and waterproof. My next report will be after 5 months or after 1 year of use. Let's see if it will continue to retain the UV qualities.
customer_reviews.author: Totustuus

customer_reviews.title: working good for us
customer_reviews.text: light weight , easy to put on and seems to be protecting the mower. it will take time to see how long the material holds up to the elements but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: E. merrill

customer_reviews.title: Works really well, mostly
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is that for whatever reason I have a hard time keeping it on the mower if there is wind. It isn't quite long enough for the drawstring to work well, and several times I have returned home to find it on the ground 15ft away. I may look into using magnets to hold it in place...we'll see. In any event, this cover got my mower out of the garage, which makes it a great purchase in my book.
customer_reviews.author: DeltaEchoBravo

customer_reviews.title: Protects the lawnmower well
customer_reviews.text: This fits our lawn mower really well. Our lawnmower has an air filter that shouldn’t get wet, so we have used tarps or grill covers in the past. This fits better than both of those and is easy to slide on and off. It is less expensive than the grill cover, and more convenient than an oversized tarp! We haven’t had it that long so I can’t really speak to the durability, but it seems to be great so far! It comes in a material bag in a wrapper, which I kind of thought was a waste, but other than that we like it.
customer_reviews.author: Srigs

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: I like my lawn mower cover. It keeps everything dry and wind not rain get under it. I didn't realize that it would change colors though from black to white stray color. Not very attractive nor did I realize that it could tear so easily. Some how mine has a huge rip at the top of it that happened during a storm. Also, since my lawn mower sits on the back porch I have chained my lawn mower down because of thieves. The cover will not fit around that part so I had to compromise and chain the wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: Nice Cover
customer_reviews.text: I was actually surprised by the quality of this product. I bought it because it was cheap and in Arizona we need the protection from the sun more than rain or other bad weather. Even though it was made for a lawn mower i am using it on an electric tiller we use to help weed our garden. It will keep the elements out of your equipment. It looks like it will last but only time will tel on that issue.
customer_reviews.author: Phil W

customer_reviews.title: I had no idea these existed ... but I'm pleased
customer_reviews.text: Gone are the days of trying to put a 105 pound Honda commercial rotary mower in the shed or just leaving it under a tarp in the wet Northwest. This cover is easy to put on, stays on during high winds and rain, and looks way better than a BBT. (Big blue tarp) It appears to have enough material to cover almost any push or self-propelled lawn mower. I highly recommend this cover.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm not so sure.
customer_reviews.text: Got it yesterday and its already blown off this morning. First off it doesn't fit well for a standard Craftsman mower but should fit a smaller one just fine. The zip string did nothing to hold it on during high winds. it actually propelled the mower OFF my paver stones. Ive managed to put it back on wheels exposed, tie the sting around the front tire and threw the water house on top. Waiting to see ifbits out there tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Smith

customer_reviews.title: To short for regular lawnmower
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to replace a cover I bought from Amazon 2 years ago that faded out. The old one fit good but it was just very faded. This one is just to small. Wind will blow it off the lawnmower. My prior cover was long enough to place part of the cover under the front wheels to prevent it from being blown off when it rains. I have just a regular sized Honda self propelled mower.
customer_reviews.author: Pb

customer_reviews.title: Lasted two years and I'm ordering another
customer_reviews.text: TIP: If you're finding that it blows away in heavy wind, roll the front wheels of your mower forward so they clamp the cover down. I have had this cover on my mower, outside in all the New England elements for two years. It's finally a little sun faded and there is one rip in it, so I'm replacing it. But for the money and considering the beating it has taken, I'd say it's a good investment and has probable extended the life of my mower.
customer_reviews.author: Addieart20

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart before a years time. :(
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this on June 28, 2019. I went to check it yesterday because it is time to start mowing again. It is shredding and falling apart. Basically rotting and tearing. I was trying to tuck it in to cover it enough till I could get another and it was falling apart while I was trying. I will never purchase again because it has not even lasted a year.
customer_reviews.author: M. Crumpton

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect around mower. I am able to fold down the handles on my mower for saving space and this cover provides more than enough room to cover the whole thing. There is a draw string that you are able to pull tightly so that the cover wraps the mower tight and won't come off when it's windy. I now have more room in my garage since I am able to leave the mower outside under this cover. Will update review when I am able to test in the rain.
customer_reviews.author: chris maxson

customer_reviews.title: Deceptive picture, bad material
customer_reviews.text: The picture implies that you can cover your lawn mover from above. This is not true, the cover is like a sack that you have to drive your mover into, which might be awkward for bigger movers, and not suitable for all locations. The quality of the plastic wasn‘t that great either, it’s not fabric but rather a thick plastic foil. I have returned mine.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't have elastic and is too short
customer_reviews.text: Is barely long enough for my push Toro gas mower, so it barely stays on, because it doesn't have elastic. The material is too slick for it to stay in place over the front wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M.

customer_reviews.title: This May Last You One Year
customer_reviews.text: It is almost entirely deteriorated after one year after outside exposure (which is precisely why I purchased it) but it will not last much longer... if at all. I am in the southern midwest of the USA and, even though our weather is not extreme, this will not last. THAT BEING SAID... $20 per year isn't so bad. I'm buying another soon.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Thicker than many other covers
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement for another brand that lasted for a few years in the Texas sun and heat. This new one is thicker than the one it is replacing. It also has a silver reflective layer on the inside. I expect this one to last a few years also. I don't know yet about waterproofing or the actual length that this item will last.
customer_reviews.author: CobraJ

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, poor fit
customer_reviews.text: This cover appears well made of good quality fabric. However, 1. it does not fit my very standard Toro mower. Misses covering the front wheels by a few inches. 2. water pools up in the center where it droops between the handle bars If it fit, it would be more useful, and earn a higher rating from me.
customer_reviews.author: drlarryw

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cover
customer_reviews.text: This cover has made leaving my mower behind my house so much more reasonable as once the cover is on,...it is somewhat camouflaged by the background trees and bushes. I no longer need to keep it in my garage and haul it outside. My HOA doesn't bother me about it.
customer_reviews.author: Jmccl2005

customer_reviews.title: Too small!
customer_reviews.text: I have a standard self-propelled lawnmower, and the cover is just a tiny bit too small to stay securely below the wheels. It’s actually blown off a number of times, and one time our neighbors found it in their yard and we were able to get it back. Because we’ve been using it and I threw away the cover, I can’t return it, but I am buying a bigger one.
customer_reviews.author: thelittlewoman

customer_reviews.title: great quality and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: we have had to store our lawn mower outside this year and this cover has made that a lot easier. we love how easy it is to throw over and pull the drawstring. there’s also enough material on the sides to tuck it under the wheels for even better protection if you want. great quality, would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Wende Moore

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good cover. It fit our mower, the only thing I didn’t really like was how the draw string never stays tight. It loosens very easily on its own, and even though the cover works great for covering it, I’m afraid it might take off in the wind during a storm. I’m probably going to have to knot it up. Still good product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Bv

customer_reviews.title: Tough as s@@t
customer_reviews.text: Have made it outside covered in our side yard with no holes , water 💧 leaking in ,etc. it has survived windy October days and two good snow dumplings without a fault! This s@@@ is the best! We are are not able to store in our garage due to a small garage and frankly endless kids bikes, table saw etc! Hey I’m one happy customer and no I’m case u r wondering no money for my review!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cindee and Mike Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 1 year
customer_reviews.text: Fit good and worked great at first but the UV rays got the best of it. It turned gray after a few months, and then started falling apart around the 1 year mark. I had to buy another brand but my new one feels like the same material unfortunately, so these all probably come from the same factory in China.
customer_reviews.author: TripleEight

customer_reviews.title: time will tell
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 5 stars even though only time will tell on its water resistance and durability. It seems to be even a little better than the one I had previously, and that one lasted several years. Afternoon sun finally weakened the material though, and I replaced it with this. Fits my Greenworks mower and would accommodate even a larger one.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon A.

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth the price
customer_reviews.text: For the money it works as advertised. I don't know why reviewers complained of the thickness of the material--for the price it is fine. On the inside near the actual engine part it has a shiny material, which I think helps with possible melting of the cover if installed on a hot engine. Yes/no?
customer_reviews.author: Darren

customer_reviews.title: A little too small for my mower
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed that the product didn't reach far down enough to cover the wheels of my Honda mower. I did like the way that the cover fits like a sleeve to protect the over and underside of my mower, and I like the drawstring at the edges of the cover to ensure a more secure fit. I just wish the cover was about 5 inches longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt stay on
customer_reviews.text: Dissappointed that this wont stay on our lawn mower and blows off every time we put it on. Will be looking into a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: the perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item, as my lawn mower is inside a shed that is not completely sealed, so during the rainy season some water could slip inside and would leave a drip of water for sometime. This worked out perfect, Problem has been basically solved. My next job, fix the shed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: The item is waterproof, it is extremely lightweight. I wish it could be tighter and secure. We have had a few windy days and it lifted off the mower from the bottom and left half exposed. If it came fully off, it would have blown away. So other than not being as smug as I like it does the job for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: Fits great
customer_reviews.text: This cover fits lawnmower and catcher snug as a bug. Someone mentioned you have to park mower into one end. That person had the cover backwards. The "pocket" goes over handle all way down over rear mounted grass catcher. Tie cord is on front. Haven't had it long enough for durability test. It seems well made!
customer_reviews.author: April Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: does not fit honda mower
customer_reviews.text: this is the second one I have purchased, first one fit my snapper mower fine. the second one does not fit my honda mower, mine is not a just a honda engine mower but a complete honda mower the the add description says it fits honda mowers, it does not fit mine.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Rybikowsky

customer_reviews.title: works, mostly
customer_reviews.text: This seems to work, mostly. Its kind of like a big bag for your push mower. Only the section over the back of the handle bars is partially open. I think where its open in a hard rain lets rain into the bag. As after a rain if you get the mower out water is sitting in the bottom of the cover. The top of my lawnmower seemed to be dry and started fine so I guess its getting in the side and settling at the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Very thin and not heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to cover an electric lawnmower. I’d be very concerned to have this as the only protection against the weather elements. The material quality is very thin and could be easily damaged. Not what I expected based on the description
customer_reviews.author: Ms LM. Greene

customer_reviews.title: So far fits good!
customer_reviews.text: I am happy that it fits. I have a Honda lawn mower and the size fit perfectly. The material is somewhat light but I guess I will see in time how sturdy it is. Glad I purchased because I was hesitant to buy thinking it would not fit it.
customer_reviews.author: rosie

customer_reviews.title: Good fit for a tiller..
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a tiller and it works great. Saves time because I can leave it within the electric fence.
customer_reviews.author: Donald W. Frey II

customer_reviews.title: Fits and looks great.
customer_reviews.text: I use to cover my lawn more with a tarp. This option is a way better deal. Not sure about some of the negative reviews about not fitting or hard to put it on, but it took me about 30 seconds to put on and pull the string to secure.
customer_reviews.author: Andrae Brown

customer_reviews.title: Light weight  and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: This lawnmower cover has already seen alot of rain and wind. It is quite stable on my lawnmower as long as I remember to pull the drawstring tight and make sure the wheels are covered. It has met my expectations. I know don't have to worry about keeping my new lawnmower out in the spring and summer elements. I call this a good and important investment.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: OK, but doesn’t fit as stated
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t fit my toro lawnmower though by the size stated it should. It also had a rip in the material when it arrived. But it is good material, just figure it to be a few inches smaller then it will probably work good for you
customer_reviews.author: Eddie R. Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality product
customer_reviews.text: A great cover for the mower in my garage. If you are gonna leave the mower outside make sure you tie down the string on the front. Otherwise the wind will lift and rain will get through. Otherwise there is no water that can get through.
customer_reviews.author: The Malecon Experience

customer_reviews.title: Mower cover
customer_reviews.text: Haven't tried it out yet just recived it today dose seem thinner then I thought but inside layer dose have the protective layer that the riding mower cover I purchased a while back and that one works great after further use I will write a better review
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Very thin material
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a durable thick material similar to a grill cover. This is very very thin material. I doubt it will last long and overall it does not seem durable or well made. Although it does appear to be waterproof. I would not recommend unless you live in a mild climate.
customer_reviews.author: K.

customer_reviews.title: Complete coverage
customer_reviews.text: I gave 4 stars for durability only because it’s hard to tell, it’s still fairly new. The cover completely covers our battery operated mower which lives in our garage. We do a lot of DIY in there (spray paint, etc), so I bought the cover to protect the mower. Glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: teacher mom

customer_reviews.title: Good cover and price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my walk behind trimmer. Cover does well keeping it free from the elements. It's thin but what do you expect with the low price. I need a shed which is in the works. This cover serves its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Chandler Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Hey Other than slight fading, Works great. Survived six major t-storms, hails, and strong winds... My lawnmower still stars as if it was garaged. Support and warrenty great as well. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Holds well in storms
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was fast. The material looks like great quality. It covers up our lawn mower very well and stays on through extremely windy/rainy storms. Definitely better than a plain ole tarp we were using. Easy to use and get onto your mower.
customer_reviews.author: Kris M

customer_reviews.title: It's Fine
customer_reviews.text: I give it good marks for fit and a little less for durability ... after a few months of use, it's starting to show some wear and tear ... if it were more durable and lasting, it would get 4 to 5 stars ...
customer_reviews.author: Rick Langdon

customer_reviews.title: Too soon to tell
customer_reviews.text: I needed it to protect the Toro 22" recycler mower. Went on easy. Only time will tell if it's waterproof (raining now) and durable. It's very roomy so would probably fit any walk-behind mower.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymoose

customer_reviews.title: Inadequate for outdoor protection
customer_reviews.text: Inadequate and disappointing compared to “tough cover” brand to cover my mower that remains outside year-round. Works best as cover for mower stored in shed or as under liner under studier cover.
customer_reviews.author: P Dud

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Do the job, price and quality is good. If you want to paid better material, probably you will paid lot of money and this one is great for the price... Great protection on my lawn mover..
customer_reviews.author: Angel Gonzalez Quinones

customer_reviews.title: Slightly undersized for my J Deere JS-26
customer_reviews.text: I liked the cover but it did not quite reach over the front wheels of my mower John Deere JS-26. The wind took it away one day because of that and I never found it. Considering buying another but have not yet done it. If I do I will use a brick to hold it down and stop mother natures laughter.
customer_reviews.author: M. Wronski

customer_reviews.title: Does a grand job of keeping your mower dry even in the worst of storms.
customer_reviews.text: Fades quickly and stiffens a bit. This next winter I’ll have to treat it with silicone to keep it flexible. Easy to use stayed on through all the Texas storms and is easy to store...
customer_reviews.author: Jace

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for craftsman
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. It fit my Craftsman mower perfectly. Has drawstring to tighten around the wheels. Since my mower has to live outside this is the ideal purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: It does the job it's supposed to. It protected it from rain. I can't really speak on durability since we've just had it a week, but the material does not look as good as what I have for our grill cover.
customer_reviews.author: Tony & Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't buy photo miss leading
customer_reviews.text: Do not like that doesn't show in photo that the engine and wheels go into a bag. Makes it almost impossible to move, wheel the lawn mower to a different place. Wouldn't buy again because of this and pass the 30 day return window.
customer_reviews.author: female homeowner

customer_reviews.title: It's in the bag!
customer_reviews.text: Too soon to tell whether it'll hold up in the Florida sun, but so far it seems to work well with no leaks. It does the job of protecting my lawn mower, which I have to store outside.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Did the job
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of moving the mower around, now cover it with this one and I saved my back. It has a string which holds it tight but you can also fold below The wheels to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Yavuz

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight but practical
customer_reviews.text: This cover is lightweight but does the trick for covering the lawnmower. I was hoping to get one that was more like the original and a heavier weight, but this will work. It does cover everything well.
customer_reviews.author: Starsof liberty

customer_reviews.title: Only okay...
customer_reviews.text: Will not stay around the mower. Whether its tight or loosely tied. Wind blows it off easily, put a small sand bag on top only to have it blow off around wheels still.
customer_reviews.author: RestlessNative

customer_reviews.title: Very thin and does not offer much protection. Collects water.
customer_reviews.text: Flaps in light wind because it's such thin material. Was expecting something a little thicker and not this. Also collects rainwater like an open plastic bag instead of water running off of it.
customer_reviews.author: Anthem

customer_reviews.title: To small for push mower but covers pressure washer
customer_reviews.text: It is to small for my Honda push mower. It would not cover the wheels and would not go over the bagger. Since it was only $10 I kept it for my pressure washer.
customer_reviews.author: jonathan

customer_reviews.title: This, but does its job well
customer_reviews.text: I have had this sitting outside on my mower for about 3 months now. It isnt the thickest cover, but it doesnt really need to be. It covers my mower really well, and it hasnt faded. Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jam

customer_reviews.title: Light and thin and waterproof.  Durability?
customer_reviews.text: It's low priced and thin and probably NOT heavy duty. But it's waterproof and stays on during a storm if fitted and secured correctly. In the shade during summer and not left out all winter it might last a few seasons. I'll update. It's been 1 season.
customer_reviews.author: Nico

customer_reviews.title: Single-Season Cover
customer_reviews.text: I have had this cover for four months to the day. It covers a lawn mower I keep outdoors in Colorado. It receives direct sun for half the day and shade the other half. Though it fits my 21 inch deck mower well, I am sad to report it already has several holes where the sun hits it most. I only remove and replace it once every week to mow the lawn. Would recommend as a very temporary protection, but can’t recommend as a permanent cover. Kept my mower dry from the rain for one single summer :(.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: It' ok
customer_reviews.text: I bought two riding mower cover and was disappointed that this one has draw sting instead of elastic as the riding mower cover. (I do believe that si disclosed, though) . So far, ti has not come off. But it just doesn't have the great fit that the riding mover cover has. Overall, I would buy it again, regardless
customer_reviews.author: SVdogs

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 2 years
customer_reviews.text: Did a great job of keeping the mower dry. Started getting splits in the fabric about 18 months of use. Used in central Florida and did get a large amount of sun wear..
customer_reviews.author: GSHP  Lover

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty lawn mover cover with adjustable cover
customer_reviews.text: i really like this cover for my lawn mower.. it was very easy to put on the day i received it!!! Now my mower can stay outside and i don't have to smell the gas and grass!!!
customer_reviews.author: JUDY STROUD

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but the fit is a little snug.
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the product is excellent. I really like the product. My only critique would be the cover is a little snug for my mower. If it were another inch longer it would be more ideal.
customer_reviews.author: S. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I just received my cover and it fits perfect for my Sun Joe Electric Lawn Mower | 14 inch | 12 Amp. Material really nice and tested for water resistance. This will do the job!!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: This has protected our mower perfectly when I can get the males in my family to put it back on :) make sure to use the draw string to keep it in place.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Protect against rain. I like it. I have my lawn mower in the backyard, and this cover helped so much to protect from water. I loved it
customer_reviews.author: Emma B.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I do not have a shed or garage to store my mower in. My old mower cover finally fell apart so I ordered this one. It is much nicer than the last one I ordered. So far so good. Drawstring feature is a bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie C. Habel

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Cover
customer_reviews.text: Simply put....PERFECT. Outstanding product and seller. Well designed and superb quality. You can look at the rest but this is by far the absolute best.
customer_reviews.author: JFC

customer_reviews.title: Secure fit
customer_reviews.text: This is the second cover I purchased for my lawn mowers. Well constructed fairly heavy duty fabric but good fits on both of them. Seems to be a very durable fabric. Time will tell especially in Colorado.
customer_reviews.author: GCD

customer_reviews.title: Not a snug fit!
customer_reviews.text: This cover is very durable but it did not fit my 22 inch gas mower. It did not fit under the front tires even when I snuggled it down with the drawstring. We always have high winds here in South Texas and one morning I found the cover loose in my back yard.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Latest one season / Update:  Himal honored past the warranty.
customer_reviews.text: Ripped and faded. Only lasted a year. (Update). Contacted the vendor and they gave me a new one. Thank you for honoring your product.
customer_reviews.author: DonJAlex2

customer_reviews.title: Stunning!
customer_reviews.text: Lawnmower looks as good as when I put the cover on it and it has been outside for a year even with a winter and snow. Very impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon purchaser

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: We haven’t had it that long but so far it’s durable it fits very nicely and it stays on. Overall right now I haven’t had any problems. I would have to review it again in a few months to see how the weather deals with it.
customer_reviews.author: marilynn mckeever

customer_reviews.title: Good Cover
customer_reviews.text: Fits my lawnmower perfectly and will help me protect it in the winter. My mower stays in the garage and will not be outside.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter Feldt

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on, not long enough for my electric mower, light weight so the wind can move it around unless it is securely tied to the mower But overall it seems rainproof and after 2 months seems to be standing up to the elements
customer_reviews.author: Skydriver

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I am purchasing a cover for my lawnmower. Reason being is b/c I store the lawnmower outside & as you can imagine the cover takes a beating w/the seasonal changes (& alley cats). Hope this one lasts through the winter!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. J

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price, but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: It is water resistant, but thin. Not at all thick like a quality tarp or a grill cover. Also I wish it were just a little bit wider, it does technically cover my 21” Honda but doesn’t reach low enough for the drawstring to grip around anything so it tends to blow off. I lay a medium sized rock on top of it, but I shouldn’t have to do that.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: good material, but only fits little push mowers
customer_reviews.text: very good material only flaw, which I can never resolve is cover is too short. I keep buying different push mower covers, and they are always an inch too short.
customer_reviews.author: JON

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: We have used this for just about 3 years now and it's great! Such a small, inexpensive investment to keep our laen mower safe from the elements outdoors. Our HOA does not allow sheds or storage containers so this is perfect! The sun does fade the color slightly over the course of time but that's not a huge deal.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good quality fabric
customer_reviews.text: I was worried this would be flimsy. It’s not. It fits my Kobalt mower snugly. I thought it was merely a cover but it’s more like a bag.
customer_reviews.author: Rainedear

customer_reviews.title: Looks LIke It WIll Work Out Fine
customer_reviews.text: Have only had it a couple of weeks. So my ratings are based on VERY incomplete data. If it turns out not to be as good as it looks, I'll try to update this review after this winter.
customer_reviews.author: Attila the Pun

product_meta.title: Himal Lawn Mower Cover - Heavy Duty 600D Polyester Oxford Waterproof, UV Protection Universal Fit with Drawstring & Cover Storage Bag
feature_bullets: [UNIVERSAL] suitable for most walk behind weeding machines (with a maximum size of 25 *74 inches); Including Toro, Craftsman, Honda, Husqvarna, Law Boy, Greenworks and Troy Bilt.
[DURABLE] made by strong 600D Oxford cloth with double stitching, to save you from the headache of wear and tear.

[SUPER WATERPROOF] with double waterproof coating inside, it is durable in both indoor and outdoor usage. To protect your weeding machine all year around from the sunlight, rain, wind, dust, leaves, resin, birds, etc.
[EASY TO USE] a tough tightening cord at the bottom allows cover to be secured to the machine. No wind can blow it away.
[EXTENSIBLE WARRANTY] Join Himal Care to extend your lawn mower cover warranty for FREE.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,857 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
